proposed_mitigation: Enforce MFA for all privileged access; quarterly review
Implement least privilege roles; policy review cadence
Quarterly access review with documented approvals

risk_statement: Root account used for routine operations
proposed_mitigation: Lock down root + MFA + alert on root usage

risk_statement: CloudTrail not enabled in all regions
proposed_mitigation: Enable CloudTrail org trail; central S3 storage
Centralize logs; define retention and access controls

risk_statement: No alerts for high-risk security events
proposed_mitigation: Create alerts for IAM changes/root activity/CloudTrail tamper
Block public access; periodic checks; least privilege

risk_statement: Sensitive data not encrypted at rest
proposed_mitigation: Enable encryption (S3/RDS/EBS) with KMS and key controls

risk_statement: TLS not enforced for external endpoints
proposed_mitigation: Enforce HTTPS/TLS policies; document exceptions

risk_statement: Backup schedule not defined for critical data
proposed_mitigation: Define backup policy; automate backups and monitoring
Quarterly restore test and documentation
Use ticket/PR approvals for IAM/logging/network changes
Use vendor checklist; require incident notification SLA

risk_statement: No incident response playbook or roles
proposed_mitigation: Create IR playbook with severity levels and roles; tabletop exercise

risk_statement: Lack of log access restrictions (too many readers)
proposed_mitigation: Restrict log bucket access; use least privilege and audit access

risk_statement: No key rotation or KMS admin separation
proposed_mitigation: Define KMS key ownership; enable rotation where applicable
Create data classification policy; handling and retention rules
Use secret manager; remove secrets from code; rotate credentials
Document access request + offboarding within X hours
